column1: '''Gilmith''' was the daughter of [[Imrazôr]], a man of [[Númenóreans
column4: Elf]]-maiden who accompanied [[Nimrodel]] before getting lost. Imrazôr took her in, they married and had two children, Gilmith and [[Galador]]. Mithrellas later ran away and was never seen again.  Galador would later become the first [[Prince of Dol Amroth]].<ref>{{UT
